summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Ã–H Wirtschaft website. All core features functioning correctly including loader animation, navigation, all 5 pages, mobile menu, footer, 404 page, and interactive elements.
passed_tests: Loader animation appears and disappears correctly (2.2 seconds)
Navigation bar with all 5 links (Home, Team, Studium, Services, Ceteris Paribus) + Kontakt button
Home page: hero section, quick links cards, about section, study programs, CTA section
Team page: team header, Vorsitzender highlight card, team member grid (13 members), join CTA section
Studium page: program lists (Bachelor, Master, MBA, ULG), study planners, accordion updates work
Services page: Sprechstunden card, Kalender card, WhatsApp community, FAQ accordions (12 items)
Magazine page: Ceteris Paribus info, editions links, contribution cards, submission timeline
404 page at /nonexistent-route with proper error message and navigation back
Client-side routing between all pages works correctly
Mobile menu hamburger toggles correctly on small viewport
Footer renders with all navigation links, contact info, social links
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes and are accessible
Accordion functionality works on Studium and Services pages
CTA buttons work and navigate correctly
Social media links are present in hero and footer
